body_html: @ezyang - then let's make it 'nbytes', just like Tensor::nbytes. Tensor::capacity_nbytes is confusing because it's a property of the storage. It's also not used a lot. Plus, can you really tell the difference between Tensor::capacity, Tensor::nbytes and Tensor::capacity_nbytes right away?
